songs.title: It’s Best For Me To Go*
songs.lyrics:
*Lyrics from snippet*

[Chorus: A$AP Rocky]
It's time for me to go
It's time for me I know
It's time for me to
It's time for me to go

[Verse 1: A$AP Rocky]
He said this a smash, I said this a pass
Full on cash, real fast
I ain't sitting in no tabs, I ain't spendin' a tab
Better get in a cab
Take a LSD, I'm sipping a tab
Tellin' her I'm sexy, she feelin' my ass
Feelin' the swag, she hittin' the, eh
I'm hittin' the back and I be, yeah
I'm hittin' the back and I be, yeah
I be chillin' now, in my feelin's now

[Chorus 2: A$AP Rocky]
It's best for me to go
It's best for me to go
It's best for me to
It's best for me to go
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
It's best for me to
It's best for me to go

[Verse 2]
Now I'm one for the cash
She be gettin' on my nerves, so I'm callin' it fast
She callin' it kids, she callin' it ass
Fallin that ass, yeah, whose boy that?
Whose lil' spoiled ass

[Chorus 2: A$AP Rocky]
It's best for me to go
It's best for me to go
It's best for me to
It's best for me to go
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
It's best for me to
It's best for me to go

[Alternate Chorus: A$AP Rocky]
Respectin' me to go
Respectin' me to go
Respectin' me to go
Respectin' me to go
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
